title: Holding Onto Faith Through Hardship - with Maria Hatch-Bowersock
description:
In one way or another, we've all experienced loss in some way during these tough times, and it can be so easy to feel discouraged when the world around is in crisis.

Perhaps you've experienced the loss of a loved one, the loss of a job, or the loss of the life you thought you'd have. If you're walking through hardship and find yourself asking, "Is God even good?" or "How do i hold onto any shred of faith through THIS?" tune into this episode to learn practical tools and a powerful perspective on what healing truly looks like from trauma survivor and author, Maria Hatch-Bowersock.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
